articles.description: Among the popular couple in Bollywood, Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt often hit the headlines when a photo of the two hits the internet. Now, an unseen photo of the two has taken over the internet and netizens are loving it.
articles.content: Whenever Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor step out in the city together, they manage to make heads turn. Recently, their Jodhpur trip on Ranbir's 39th birthday made headlines and photos from the trip wen… [+1587 chars]

articles.author: Quint Entertainment
articles.title: I’ve Dealt With It for Years: Yami Gautam Opens up About Her Skin Condition - The Quint
articles.description: Yami Gautam took to Instagram and shared her unedited pictures from a recent photoshoot. In the caption, she opened up about her skin condition which she has been dealing with for years. She added that she's decided to embrace the skin condition.
articles.content: Sharing her pictures from a recent photoshoot, Yami wrote, For those who haven't heard about this, its a skin condition wherein you get tiny bumps on the skin. I promise they arent as bad as your min… [+753 chars]
